Title: Georgia shooting: Mother of suspect called school before attack, warned about 'extreme emergency'
Description: Phone records provided by a relative to the Post show a 10-minute call to Apalachee High School in Winder, Georgia, at 9:50 a.m., about 30 minutes before the attack began.

Title: Pakistan: Imran Khan's party stage rally; demand his immediate release
Description: Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf slammed the government for its crackdown on the party as police fired tear gas to disperse the crowd.

Title: Qatar Red Crescent & UNRWA sign $4.5 million pact to aid 4,400 stranded Gazans in West Bank
Description: Three Israelis were shot and killed Sunday at the border crossing between the West Bank and Jordan, Israeli officials said, in what appeared to be an attack linked to the 11-month-old war in Gaza.

Title: Bangladesh wants relations with India based on equity & fairness: Chief Adviser Yunus
Description: Yunus, 84, made the remarks while responding to a question at a meeting with students who had participated in the student-people revolution that ousted Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina last month, state-run BSS news agency reported.

Title: Harris vs Trump: Philadelphia debate to spotlight Pennsylvania's influence in 2024 presidential race
Description: Pennsylvanians broke a string of six Democratic victories in the state when they helped propel Trump to victory in 2016, then backed native son Joe Biden in the 2020 race against Trump.

Title: Boeing inks deal to avoid strike, offers 25% pay raise, $3,000 bonuses & more
Description: An accepted deal would secure labor peace for Boeing at a time when the planemaker is burning cash and trying to raise production of its strongest-selling 737 MAX to a target rate of 38 aircraft a month by the year's end. It also avoids a strike that could have made Boeing a focus point in the 2024 presidential election.

Title: In final campaign push, Kamala Harris uses favorite food, childhood memories to connect with voters
Description: From talking about nacho cheese Doritos as her snack of choice to washing collard greens in the bathtub, Harris is aiming to connect with voters on a more personal level.

Title: Sudan rejects UN experts' call for 'impartial' force as death toll reaches over 20,000
Description: The conflict since April last year, pitting the army against paramilitary forces, has killed tens of thousands of people and triggered one of the world's worst humanitarian crises.

Title: Greece to impose a 20-euro tax on cruise ship arrivals to protect popular islands from overtourism
Description: Greece relies heavily on tourism, the main driver of the country’s economy which is still recovering from a decade-long crisis that wiped out a fourth of its output.

Title: Algeria: Abdelmadjid Tebboune poised for victory amid allegations of 'inflated results'
Description: The campaign of Algerian presidential challenger Abdelaali Hassani claimed on Sunday there was vote-rigging during the previous day's election which incumbent Abdelmadjid Tebboune is expected to win.

Title: Stop sponsoring terror, we will start dialogue': India's stern message to Pakistan
Description: The defence minister said when Pakistan stops sponsoring terrorism in Jammu and Kashmir, India will start dialogue with them.

Title: Pakistan's economic woes deepen as it faces complex web of challenges
Description: Another commentator noted that Pakistan heavily relies on the generosity of external benefactors and seems unwilling to make the tough decisions necessary to revive its economy.

Title: Abu Dhabi Crown Prince Al Nahyan arrives in Delhi to boost bilateral ties
Description: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal received the Crown Prince at the airport following which he was accorded a ceremonial welcome, in reflection of the importance India has attached to the visit.

Title: US polls 2024: Georgia’s black voters at the center of Trump-Harris election showdown
Description: A significant contest is unfolding over the Black voters in a battleground state, where they constitute a third of the population—the highest proportion among the seven states that will determine the outcome of the November 5 presidential election. This demographic is expected to play a crucial role in shaping the election's result, making it a key focus for both parties.

Title: US Republicans push for citizenship check in government funding bill
Description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has proposed a six-month stop-gap funding bill that includes a controversial requirement for proof of citizenship for voter registration. The bill is expected to face strong opposition from Democrats and may complicate efforts to avoid a government shutdown

Title: India reports suspected mpox case in traveller from affected country
Description: Mpox can spread through close contact. Usually mild, it is fatal in rare cases. It causes flu-like symptoms and pus-filled lesions on the body.

Title: After one year, just 1,000 Morrocan homes rebuilt out of 60,000 destroyed in quake
Description: One year after the devastating 6.8-magnitude earthquake in Morocco's High Atlas region, only 1,000 of the 60,000 damaged homes have been rebuilt. Reconstruction efforts are hampered by slow permit approvals and administrative hurdles, leaving many victims still living in temporary shelters

Title: Libya detains militia leader in human trafficker's killing probe
Description: Libya's chief prosecutor has ordered the detention of Mohamed Bahroun, a prominent militia leader, and his aide as part of an investigation into the killing of notorious human trafficker Abdel-Rahman Milad. The detention follows allegations of their involvement in Milad's September 1st shooting in Tripoli
